summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1325, for the improvement of East Cherry Street from 35th Avenue to 37th Avenue, all in the City of Seattle by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, under Ordinance No. 14971 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
